Built with inner strength

  • Visual stunner that takes inspiration from architectur
  • Using strong tempered glass
  • The polished glass goes through 5 layers of silk printing
  • Its refined texture and gleaming surface
  • Perfect complement to any home

Best scale!

“The multiple data readouts are useful and tracking on i-phone is a boon. My doctor is impressed with the information I can submit on a printout of the serial data.” Tracey L., New York “The multiple data readouts are useful and tracking on i-phone is a boon. My doctor is impressed with the information I can submit on a printout of the serial data.” Tracey L., New York
